HowItWorks.title: How does it work?
HowItWorks.subtitle: Simple 7-step process for your customers and you

steps.title: Your customized store is integrated
steps.description: We integrate your personalized gift card store directly into your website

steps.title: The client visits your website
steps.description: Customers can easily find and access your gift card store from your main website

steps.title: They choose and personalize the gift voucher
steps.description: Customers select the perfect gift and customize it with personal messages and designs

steps.title: They pay online, individually or in a group
steps.description: Secure payment processing with options for individual purchases or group contributions

steps.title: The voucher is sent instantly via email
steps.description: Automatic delivery ensures customers receive their gift vouchers immediately after purchase

steps.title: You receive the payment
steps.description: Instant payment processing means you get paid immediately when vouchers are sold

steps.title: The recipient redeems the voucher later
steps.description: Recipients can use their vouchers at their convenience, typically within 6 months
